title: Syntax error in build_environment.py
body:
Hi all,
I tried compiling `hdf5` but the build process crashes with the following error. Note that this crash happens after the dependencies are installed and `spack` wants to compiler `hdf5` itself

    spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:563, in child_execution:
         548      def child_execution(child_connection, input_stream):
         549          try:
         550              setup_package(pkg, dirty=dirty)
         551              function(input_stream)
         552              child_connection.send(None)
         553          except:
         554              # catch ANYTHING that goes wrong in the child process
         555              exc_type, exc, tb = sys.exc_info()
         556  
         557              # Need to unwind the traceback in the child because traceback
         558              # objects can't be sent to the parent.
         559              tb_string = traceback.format_exc()
         560  
         561              # build up some context from the offending package so we can
         562              # show that, too.
      >> 563              package_context = get_package_context(tb)
         564  
         565              build_log = None
         566              if hasattr(pkg, 'log_path'):
         567                  build_log = pkg.log_path
         568  
         569              # make a pickleable exception to send to parent.
         570              msg = "%s: %s" % (str(exc_type.__name__), str(exc))
         571  
         572              ce = ChildError(msg, tb_string, build_log, package_context)
         573              child_connection.send(ce)
         574  
         575          finally:
         576              child_connection.close()
